value:
$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_00_Ike_MF_Pair,Face|I don't like the look of this place, Ike.
What are we doing here again?$k$p$nMPID_比翼アイク|Like the lady said—we're here to
show our "true strength."$k$pSeems like fighting is going to be
the surest way back to our world.$k$p$nMPID_ミスト|I hope it's not her we have to fight.
She looked really strong...$k$p$nMPID_比翼アイク|Whatever we're up against, Father's
training will see us through. He's the
best there is, and we take after him.$k$p$nMPID_ミスト|I don't know, Ike. We're just kids...$k$p$nMPID_比翼アイク|Stay close, follow my lead, and we'll
be fine.$k$pHold up—someone's coming.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Before01,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_00_Ike_MF_Pair,Face|Oh! Hello! Did someone guide you
to this place too?$k$pI'm Mist, and this is my brother, Ike.
What's your name?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Before01,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_00_Ike_MF_Pair,Face|Hey, it's OK, come back! Oh no,
I think I scared him off. He looked like
he was about to say something...$k$p$nMPID_比翼アイク|It's dangerous to be alone out here.
Let's make sure he's all right.$k$p

$WmMPID_幼少ボーレ,ch09_27_Bole_M_Before01,Face|Hellooo? Can anyone hear me?
What the heck...$k$pWhat was it that lady said? Get
strong? Be stronger? Yeah, that's
not gonna be a problem...$k$pI mean, I was gonna do it anyway, for
Oscar and Rolf's—whoa! What'd I
just trip over?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Mmm... Yes, I'll have seconds of
everything, please...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ボーレ,ch09_27_Bole_M_Before01,Face|Uh, hey, are you OK? C'mon, you
shouldn't be sleeping here. Get up.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Huh? Oh, sorry, hi. You don't happen
to have something to eat, do you?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_幼少ボーレ,ch09_27_Bole_M_Before01,Face|So you're hungry basically all the
time, huh? That sounds terrible.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|It is... It really is...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ボーレ,ch09_27_Bole_M_Before01,Face|I'm lucky to never go hungry. My
older brother cooks for me all the
time. Oscar's an amazing chef.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|We should go find him right away.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ボーレ,ch09_27_Bole_M_Before01,Face|Huh?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|A great chef's exactly what I need...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ボーレ,ch09_27_Bole_M_Before01,Face|Hey, I never said—where are you
going? You don't even know what
he looks like!$k$p$Sbs150|
